Articles.Content:
Hi,

I've been trying to get an install working with RSS but I always get stuck at a loading screen. Its not a memory problem, I'm playing with 2048 textures, removed all the "squad" parts, and KSP is only using 1gb of ram, so its something else.

![rXAmI21.png](http://i.imgur.com/rXAmI21.png)

![6N2FWQG.png](http://i.imgur.com/6N2FWQG.png)

![H3YvApy.png](http://i.imgur.com/H3YvApy.png)

Log: [http://pastebin.com/AAUp0HBL](http://pastebin.com/AAUp0HBL)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-22T18:44:54Z" title="06/22/2015 06:44  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 22, 2015</time> by C1maCat**
  
Fixed images

You need to update your KSP. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

(You're still on 1.0, 1.0.2 has been out for like a month or two)
